alert.note: Alert for Butler; Montgomery; Preble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 10:31AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF PREBLE, BUTLER AND WESTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 AM EDT... At 1030 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from West College Corner to Oldenburg, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Middletown, Fairfield, Trotwood, Oxford, Miamisburg, Forest Park, Vandalia, Englewood, Monroe, Trenton, Springdale, Eaton, Moraine, South Middletown, West Carrollton, Ross, Camden and Lewisburg. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 11 and 32. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 64 and 65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
